tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Henderson is an amazing instructor! His lectures were funny, interesting and informative. He renewed my enthusiasm for seeking this degree, and I hope to have the chance to take one of his classes again. WONDERFUL!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Outstanding professor. Very knowledgeable of his subject and explains the material clearly; like someone said, a walking textbook. Doesn\'t make the course extremely demanding as almost a respect and consideration to other course load. It\'s understandable to see why he\'s so highly esteemed; I might be inclined to take more of his courses.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Wonderful Professor! I looked forward to attending his classes everyday because he always brought a fun feel to the class. At times it felt like we were all just friends talking. EXCELLENT TEACHER!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took him my very first semester returnin to school as an adult student (Fall 2009. was vry nervous but he was WONDERFUL. Excellent teacher, EXTREMELY knowledgable about subject, passionate about topic, easy to talk to, very understanding. I had opportunity to see him perform his oe man skit as Justice Thurgood Marshall - LOVED IT !!! take him!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Henderson\'s pros are that he is nice, very knowledgable of the material, and only requires students to complete two papers in order to get an A. The cons are his class has no structure and students pay for a textbook that is barely used. Recommendations: don\'t bother to purchase a book.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Extremely knowledgeable, engaging, and helpful. 10% class participation, 45% each of two papers (no minimum page count)comparative analysis of two jurisdictions, and impact of urban policy. Highly recommend

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Henderson is by FAR one of the best professors in the department of public administration. There are other great professors, however, he is extremely understanding and provides a wealth helpful information. Henderson is extremely knowledgeable. He is a walking book. I would recommend anyone to take his class(es).
